newsitem.title: JAPAN: RESEARCH ALERT - Maruichi Steel Tube rated.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Maruichi Steel Tube rated.

text.p: Daiwa Institute of Research Ltd has assigned Maruichi Steel Tube Ltd a "B" rating, Daiwa Securities brokers said on Wednesday.

In its three-grade rating system, the research institute assigns a "B" rating to issues whose values it sees moving within 10 percentage points in either direction of the Tokyo Stock Exchange first-section TOPIX index over the next six months.
